response.overview: The latest work to utilize real time tracking and face projection mapping using a state of the art 1000 fps projector and ultra high speed sensing, "INORI-PRAYER-," has been released. This project was born when Nobumichi Asai (WOW) approached collaborators TOKYO (http:// www.lab.tokyo.jp/), the dancing duo AyaBambi, and the Ishikawa Watanabe Laboratory at the University of Tokyo
response.title: WOW | INORI - PRAYER -
